DOC.brief_summary: Subjects with peritoneal dialysis are randomized to different groups. The different groups receive different intra-abdominal volumes and different glucose-concentrations. The effects on blood pressure and other cardiovascular parameters (e.g. central blood pressure, augmentation index, ...) will be evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Acute Haemodynamic Effects of Peritoneal Dialysis as Evaluated by Sphygmocor Technology
DOC.criteria: Subjects with peritoneal dialysis Aged 1880 years
